mapper.update: update member set member_num = #{memberNum}, member_name = #{memberName}, member_grade = #{memberGrade}, member_sex = #{memberSex}, member_status = #{memberStatus}, member_tel = #{memberTel}, remarks = #{remarks} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id,member_num,member_name,member_grade,member_sex,member_status,member_tel,remarks from member where id = #{id} and status = 1;
